name: fhevm-sdk-monorepo
description: Universal FHEVM SDK - A framework-agnostic SDK for building confidential frontends with FHEVM

scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run build:examples
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:nextjs && npm run build:react
scripts.lint: npm run lint:sdk && npm run lint:examples
scripts.lint:examples: cd examples/nextjs-demo && npm run lint && cd ../react-demo && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rimraf packages/*/dist examples/*/dist templates/*/dist node_modules packages/*/node_modules examples/*/node_modules templates/*/node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:examples
scripts.install:examples: cd examples/nextjs-demo && npm install && cd ../react-demo && npm install
